AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsecldap
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LDAP: Checks whether the system has LDAP configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_unique_account_names
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001008 (CAT I): All accounts on AIX system must have unique account names.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_unique_user_ids
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001009 (CAT I): All accounts on AIX must be assigned unique User Identification Numbers (UIDs).

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_special_account_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001011 (CAT II): Direct logins to the AIX system must not be permitted to shared accounts, default accounts, application accounts, and utility accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssh_replay_resistance
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001012 (CAT I): AIX must use the SSH server to implement replay-resistant authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_emergency_account_removal
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001014 (CAT II): The AIX system must automatically remove or disable emergency accounts after the crisis is resolved or 72 hours.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_root_web_browsers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001032 (CAT II): AIX administrative accounts must not run a web browser, except as needed for local service administration.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ldr_preload_unset
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001037 (CAT II): The AIX root accounts list of preloaded libraries must be empty.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_null_passwords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001038 (CAT II): AIX must not have accounts configured with blank or null passwords.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssl_ldap_authentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001045 (CAT II): IF LDAP is used, AIX LDAP client must use SSL to authenticate with LDAP server.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_data_confidentiality
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001048 (CAT II): AIX must protect the confidentiality and integrity of all information at rest.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_session_lock
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001100 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to allow users to directly initiate a session lock for all connection types.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ssl_ldap_client_authentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001104 (CAT II): If LDAP authentication is required on AIX, SSL must be used between LDAP clients and the LDAP servers to protect the integrity of remote access sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_certificate_authorities
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001105 (CAT II): AIX must only allow the use of DoD PKI-established certificate authorities for verification of the establishment of protected sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sshstart
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001124 (CAT I): AIX root passwords must never be passed over a network in clear text form.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audittimestamp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002012(CAT II): AIX must use internal clock to generate timestamp for audit records.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_fipspasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001134 (CAT II): The password hashes stored on AIX system must have been generated using a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX-00-001030 ( CAT II):AIX must not permit root login using remote access program rlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_shells
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003110 (CAT II): The /etc/shells file must exist and must be configured to use in login.cfg file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nntpperm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003013 (CAT II): AIX passwd.nntp file must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disqdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003042 (CAT II): The AIX qdaemon must be disabled if local or remote printing is not required.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003043 (CAT II): If AIX system does not act as a remote print server, the lpd daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dispiobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003044 (CAT II): If AIX system does not act as a remote print server, the piobe daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003045 (CAT II): If there are no X11 clients that require CDE on AIX, the dtservice must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sendmail_loglevel
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003038 (CAT II): AIX sendmail logging must not be set to less than nine in the sendmail.cf file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sendmail_greeting
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003114 (CAT II): If the AIX host is running an SMTP service, the SMTP greeting must not provide version information.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sendmail_privacyoptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003117 (CAT II): SMTP service must not have the EXPN or VRFY features active on AIX systems.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sendmail_version
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003116 (CAT II): The sendmail server must have the debug feature disabled on AIX systems.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003048 (CAT II): If snmpd is not required on AIX, the snmpd service must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdhcpcddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003049 (CAT II): If dhcpcd is not required on AIX, the dhcpcd service must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdhcprddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003050 (CAT II): If dhcprd is not required on AIX, the dhcprd service must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdhcpsddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003104 (CAT II): If dhcpsd is not required on AIX, the dhcpsd service must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disautoconf6
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003051 (CAT II): If IPV6 is not utilized on AIX Server, the autoconf6 daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disgateddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003052 (CAT II): If AIX server is not functioning as a network router, the gated daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dismrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003053 (CAT II): If AIX server is not functioning as a multicast router, the mrouted daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disnameddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003054 (CAT II): If AIX server is not functioning as a DNS Server, the named daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003055 (CAT II): If AIX server is not functioning as a network router, the routed daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003056 (CAT II): If rwhod is not required on AIX, the rwhod daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distimeddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003057 (CAT II): The timed daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003058 (CAT II): If AIX server does not host an SNMP agent, the dpid2 daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003060 (CAT II): If SNMP is not required on AIX, the snmpmibd daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003061 (CAT II): The aixmibd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disndpdhostdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003062 (CAT II): The ndpd-host daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disndpdrouterdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003063 (CAT II): The ndpd-router daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003064 (CAT II): The daytime daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disudpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003064 (CAT II): The daytime daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_discmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003065 (CAT II): The cmsd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disttbdserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003066 (CAT II): The ttbdserver daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003067 (CAT II): The uucp(UNIX to UNIX Copy Program) daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003068 (CAT II): The time daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disudptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003068 (CAT II): The time daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003069 (CAT II): The talk daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003070 (CAT II): The ntalk daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003071 (CAT II): The chargen daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disudpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003071 (CAT II): The chargen daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disudpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003072 (CAT II): The discard daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_distcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003072 (CAT II): The discard daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disdtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003073 (CAT II): The dtspc daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_dispcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003074 (CAT II): The pcnfsd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003075 (CAT II): The rstatd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ruserd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003076 (CAT II): The ruserd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003105 (CAT II): The rwalld daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003077 (CAT II): The sprayd daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_klogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003078 (CAT II): The klogin daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_kshell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003079 (CAT II): The kshell daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003080 (CAT II): The rquotad daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003081 (CAT II): The tftp daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_imap2
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003082 (CAT II): The imap2 service must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_pop3
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003083 (CAT II): The pop3 daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_finger
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003084 (CAT II): The finger daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_instsrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003085 (CAT II): The instsrv daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003086 (CAT II): The echo daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003086 (CAT II): The echo daemon must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_innd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003087 (CAT II): The Internet Network News (INN) server must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nntpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003087 (CAT II): The Internet Network News (INN) server must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rlogind
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003041 (CAT I): The AIX rlogind service must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002058 (CAT I): The AIX rexecd daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_telnetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002059 (CAT I): The AIX telnet daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ftpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002060 (CAT I): The AIX ftpd daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001102 (CAT II): AIX must employ strong authentication in the establishment of sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nosuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001056 (CAT II): NFS file systems on AIX must be mounted with the nosuid option unless the NFS file systems contain approved setuid or setgid programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nosuidopt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001138 (CAT II): NFS file systems on AIX must be mounted with the nosuid option unless the NFS file systems contain approved setuid or setgid programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_disable_automount
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003090 (CAT II): If automated file system mounting tool is not required on AIX, it must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_commitinstallp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003028 (CAT II): AIX must remove all software components after updated versions have been installed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_clean_partial_connections
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003097 (CAT II): AIX must protect against DOS attacks by implementing rate limiting measures on impacted network interfaces.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_broadcast_ping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003135 (CAT II): AIX must not respond to ICMPv6 echo requests sent to a broadcast address.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_ip6forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002065 (CAT II): AIX must not have IP forwarding for IPv6 enabled unless the system is a router.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sudo_authenticate
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002062 (CAT II): AIX must remove !authenticate option from sudo config files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sudo_nopasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002061 (CAT II): AIX must remove NOPASSWD tag from sudo config files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_samba
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002089 (CAT II): Samba packages must be removed from AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_lockcommand
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001028 (CAT II): AIX must provide session lock command.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_xlockcommand
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001029 (CAT II): AIX must provide xlock command in CDE Environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_mkusersys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001015 (CAT II): The shipped /etc/security/mkuser.sys file must not be customized directly.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_mkusersyscustom
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001000 (CAT II): AIX /etc/security/mkuser.sys.custom must not exist on unless it is needed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_wallcommand
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003098 (CAT II): AIX system must allow users to send message to all the users who logged in currently.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_writecommand
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003099 (CAT II): AIX system must allow admins to send message to a user who logged in currently.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_pgrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001016 (CAT II): The regular users default primary group must be staff on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_enablerbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003102 (CAT II): AIX must turn on enhanced Role Based Access control.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_etchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003138 (CAT II): There must be no hosts.equiv on the AIX system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003101 (CAT II): There must be no .rhosts ,.shosts and .netrc files on the AIX system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_shostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003138 (CAT II): There must be no shosts.equiv files on the AIX system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rmplusgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001047 (CAT II): THE AIX /etc/passwd, /etc/security/passwd, and /etc/group files must not contain plus (+) markers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rmpluspasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001047 (CAT II): THE AIX /etc/passwd, /etc/security/passwd, and /etc/group files must not contain plus (+) markers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rmplussecpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001047 (CAT II): THE AIX /etc/passwd, /etc/security/passwd, and /etc/group files must not contain plus (+) markers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sysacctuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001036 (CAT II): UIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_justified_remote_syslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002131 (CAT II): AIX must only use remote syslog servers justified and documented using site-defined procedures.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_syslogownership
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002070 (CAT II): All AIX log files must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sysloggrp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002071 (CAT II): All AIX log files must be group owned by security.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_publicdir
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-001031 (CAT II): ALL AIX Public directories must be owned by root.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_audiodev
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002079 (CAT II): AIX audio device must be group owned by root,sys,bin, or system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckucb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclchecketc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckusrbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckusrsbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclchecksbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003009 (CAT II): All system command files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckmethods
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003010 (CAT II): All Library files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclchecksecurity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003010 (CAT II): All Library files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckvarlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003007 (CAT II): All log files files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckvarsyslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003007 (CAT II): All log files files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckvaradm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003007 (CAT II): All log files files must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclchecketcgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003015 (CAT II): The AIX /etc/group file must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-001040 (CAT II): The AIX root accounts home directory must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_aclcheckuserhome
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003019 (CAT II): The AIX user home directories must not have extended ACLs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rshd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003040 (CAT II): The AIX rsh daemon must be disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_enhancedRBAC
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003102 (CAT II): AIX must turn on enhanced Role-Based Access Control.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_sctp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003088 (CAT II): Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003089 (CAT II): The Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) protocol must be disabled on AIX.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-002063 (CAT II): AIX must be configured with a default gateway for IPV4

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_nslookup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-002125 (CAT II): AIX must verify that name/address resolution is received from authoritative services.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_forward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements DoD Recommendations AIX7-00-003115 (CAT II): AIX must not contain .forward files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_auditselect
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002011 (CAT II): AIX must provide auditselect command.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_checkgrps
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002087 (CAT II): All files and directories in users home directories must be group owned by a group in which the owner is a member.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_checkgrpsown
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG Recommendation STIG-ID STIG-ID AIX7-00-003018 (CAT II): All files and directories in users home directories must be group owned by a group in which the owner is a member.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-002032 (CAT II): AIX must provide RBAC roles to perform auditing on all operating system components.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_tvftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003022 (CAT II): AIX must disable trivial file transfer protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_kerdump
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003094 (CAT II): AIX kernel core dumps must be disabled unless needed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_rmpluslpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003037 (CAT II): The AIX hosts.lpd file must not contain a + character.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_gid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003033 (CAT II): All AIX group identifiers referenced in /etc/passwd file must be defined in /etc/group file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_bootdev
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003112 (CAT II): AIX must be configured to only boot from system boot device.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv7_bootldr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements STIG recommendation STIG-ID AIX7-00-003113 (CAT II): AIX must not use removable media as a boot loader.
